name: Mirror Cage
description: When your Mirror Maiden, who has this card equipped, creates a Refraction, it will have +1 starting Duration (Rounds). It will also increase the Hydro DMG the character to which this is attached takes by 1.
descriptionraw: When your $[A2202], who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122021]</color>, it will have +1 starting $[K4]. It will also increase the $[K102] the character to which this is attached takes by 1.
descriptionreplaced: When your Mirror Maiden, who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Refraction</color>, it will have +1 starting <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>. It will also increase the {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> the character to which this is attached takes by 1.
